title: Can anyone recommend a good Chinese brush style face, that isn't cheesy?
content: Something thick but elegant, designed for short passages of relatively small text - 10pt to 16pt. Free/paid.
author: richardhenry

comments.content:
What about Sanvito or Silentium? Adobe.  
Or Fusaka, but that is more a japanese style.

Good luck

I like this one - Azuki

[http://www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=BLVI-AZUK](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419054149/http:/www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=BLVI-AZUK "http://www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=BLVI-AZUK")

JH
